titleStmt.title: The extravagant poet. A comical novel, wherein is described his many pleasant follies. Translated out of French, by G.R. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Oudin, César, d. 1625.
G. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B.M. [i.e. R. Bentley and M. Magnes] at the sign of Pegasus, at the foot of Parnassus his hill,

notesStmt.note: With added engraved title page, reading: The extravagant poet novel.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the sign of Pegasus, at the foot of Parnassus his hill
